channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Leaflet Maps Marker (Google Maps, OpenStreetMap, Bing Maps)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Leaflet Maps Marker (Google Maps, OpenStreetMap, Bing Maps)

item.title: CVE-2022-4677|2024-08-03T01:48:39.574Z -- unknown -- leaflet%20maps%20marker%20%28google%20maps%2C%20openstreetmap%2C%20bing%20maps%29
item.description: The Leaflet Maps Marker WordPress plugin before 3.12.7 does not validate and escape one of its shortcode attributes, which could allow users with a role as low as contributor to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attack.
